::: {.cell}

:::


::: {.cell}

:::

This page provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**F1.4 Seasonal upland streams**](/efg-info/F1_4.qmd). For older or alternative maps, see [here](/altmap-info/F1_4_history.qmd).

## Methods

Here is the methods summary for **Map code and version**: F1.4.web.map v1.0.

> Freshwater ecoregions (Abell et al. 2008) were identified as containing occurrences of these functional groups if: i) their descriptions mentioned features consistent with those identified in the profile of the Ecosystem Functional Group; and ii) if their location was consistent with the ecological drivers described in the profile. Within the selected ecoregions, major occurrences were mapped using 1st-4th order streams (3km buffer) taken from the RiverATLAS (v1.0) database (Linke et al. 2019). The remaining areas of selected ecoregions were mapped as minor occurrences.

::: {.cell}

:::



::: {.cell}

:::



### Datasets

**FEOW-2008** (Abell et al. 2008):

Source of _biogeographical range_.
 Resolution: variable (polygons), static.
 Accuracy evaluation: qualitative (experts judgement).

 **HydroAtlas-1.0** (Linke et al. 2019):

Source of _Hydrography_.
 Resolution: <1km2, static.
 Accuracy evaluation: derived from sources.

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset        |url                                                                                                                                 |
|:--------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|FEOW-2008      |<https://www.feow.org/>{target='links'} :: <https://geospatial.tnc.org/datasets/38da4656e8074e1c820c42cc21cd76cd_0>{target='links'} |
|HydroAtlas-1.0 |<https://www.hydrosheds.org/page/hydroatlas>{target='links'}                                                                        |


:::
:::

### Processing

Processing steps used in this map are: *Selection* :: *Reclassification* :: *Buffering* :: *Clipping*.

### Map evaluation


This map is considered to be a ***Medium quality map*** based on the following characteristics:

Concept alignment is *Semi-direct,general*.

Ground observations are _NA_.

 The accuracy evaluation *Compiled from reputable source data,documented,qualitative*.

## How to use the data

### Available files

:::{.aside}

Following maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group. `Web navigation` maps are optimised for use in webapps, but they have similar methods and differ only in details of format and processing. 

- Indicative Map (**code: F1.4.IM.grid**, version v2.0) 
 - Web navigation (**code: F1.4.web.map**, version v1.0) 


:::

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

**F1.4.IM.grid** (v2.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/F1.4.IM.grid_v2.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934){target="gisdata"}

**F1.4.web.map** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/F1.4.web.map_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090968){target="gisdata"} :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.F1_4_web_map){target="gisdata"} :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

Datasets used to create this map might have some restriction for commercial use, see details below.


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}

:::
